name: ListAvailableUserTasks

properties.name: Filters
properties.description: Filter for a specific UserTaskType.Name using a property name and a list of values.

properties.name: Labels
properties.description: Return only UserTasks with one of the specified labels

properties.name: UserID
properties.description: Return only UserTasks attached to this UserID

properties.name: UserTaskSubTypes
properties.description: Return only UserTasks with one of the specified subtypes

properties.name: UserTaskTypes
properties.description: Return only UserTasks of one of the specified types
